marklogic.body:
More Bleeding-heart comments from those who support the "gimmee" agenda. Despite numerous attempts to help this lady, she chose to live the way she did. When one chooses to live that way, one is also choosing to die that way. Now her friends and others want a housing area where inebriates can live and drink, like the one in Anchorage. And who is expected to pay for it? You and I. Always "gimmee" more, more, more.
I feel sorry for this lady and her associates, but I give lots of my hard-earned money to charity already. Stop with the continual demands, already!
